channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: The Biden administration may soon restart a key immigration
item.description: The Biden administration may soon restart a key immigration program that had been paused this summer over concerns of fraud, according to a source familiar with the matter.

item.title: HAVE YOU SEEN BRIAN DOYLE? Redmond Police are requesting th
item.description: HAVE YOU SEEN BRIAN DOYLE? Redmond Police are requesting the public’s help in finding a missing 23-year-old man who left his northeast Redmond home Sunday morning and “may be in crisis."

item.title: Wall Street just gave Warren Buffett an early birthday gift:
item.description: Wall Street just gave Warren Buffett an early birthday gift: Berkshire Hathaway is now worth $1 trillion.
